com.arjuna.ats.internal.jdbc

Class IndirectRecoverableConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arjuna.ats.internal.jdbc.BaseTransactionalDriverXAConnection
      • com.arjuna.ats.internal.jdbc.IndirectRecoverableConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionalDriverXAConnection, RecoverableXAConnection

    public class IndirectRecoverableConnection
extends BaseTransactionalDriverXAConnection
implements RecoverableXAConnection, TransactionalDriverXAConnection
    This class is responsible for maintaining connection information in such a manner that we can recover the connection to the XA database in the event of a failure.
    Since:
    JTS 2.0.
    Version:
    $Id: IndirectRecoverableConnection.java 2342 2006-03-30 13:06:17Z $
    Author:
    Mark Little (mark@arjuna.com)
